alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 11 at 4:01AM EST until March 12 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Bradford, Susquehanna, Wyoming, Lackawanna and Luzerne counties. In New York, Chenango, Tioga and Broome counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow could produce snowfall rates of 1-2 inches per hour for a time late tonight into Saturday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission strongly encourage motorist to heed all travel restrictions and delay unnecessary travel. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadways, and traffic conditions.
